title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

title: Bringing Up Baby
description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

title: You Can't Take It with You
description: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

title: The Lady Vanishes
description: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
description: A gangster idolized by the street kids of his old neighborhood is asked by his childhood friend, now a priest, to turn the boys away from a life of crime.

title: Jezebel
description: A headstrong Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, but attempts to redeem herself when yellow fever strikes New Orleans.

title: Pygmalion
description: A phonetics professor makes a bet that he can train a bedraggled Cockney flower girl to pass for a duchess at an ambassador's garden party.

title: Boys Town
description: Against all odds, Father Flanagan starts a home for underprivileged and delinquent boys, but his patience is tested by a tough new arrival.

title: Holiday
description: A young man falls in love with a woman from a wealthy family, but his plan to take a long holiday from work to find himself clashes with their materialistic values.

title: A Christmas Carol
description: An elderly miser learns the error of his ways on Christmas Eve when he is visited by three spirits.

title: Marie Antoinette
description: The tragic life of the Austrian princess who became the Queen of France and was eventually beheaded during the French Revolution.

title: The Citadel
description: An idealistic young doctor in a Welsh mining village fights against the medical establishment and corruption to treat his patients properly.

title: Alexander's Ragtime Band
description: A conductor of a ragtime band and a singer fall in love and make it big, but their relationship suffers over the years due to professional conflicts.

title: Four Daughters
description: The lives of four musical sisters are disrupted when a charming composer and a cynical orchestrator enter their home.

title: Algiers
description: A notorious French jewel thief hiding in the Casbah of Algiers falls for a beautiful tourist, which tempts him to leave his safe haven.

title: Test Pilot
description: A reckless test pilot's wife and his best friend struggle to cope with his dangerous profession.

title: Block-Heads
description: Stan has been guarding a trench for 20 years, unaware the war is over. Ollie rescues him, but trouble follows them home.

title: Room Service
description: A flat-broke theatrical producer and his brothers try to avoid eviction from their hotel room while trying to secure a backer for their new play.

title: Carefree
description: A psychiatrist falls in love with his friend's fiancée while treating her to help her decide between the two men.

title: Vivacious Lady
description: A botany professor marries a nightclub singer on a whim, but has trouble breaking the news to his conservative family.

title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
description: A multi-millionaire with seven ex-wives meets a woman who is determined to marry him but teach him a lesson.

title: The Dawn Patrol
description: During WWI, the commander of a flight squadron in France struggles with the heavy emotional toll of sending his men to their deaths.

title: Three Comrades
description: Three German soldiers return home from WWI and open an auto repair shop, where they all fall for the same dying woman.

title: Port of Shadows
description: An army deserter tries to escape France for Venezuela, but gets tangled with a beautiful woman, her shady guardian, and local gangsters.

title: Alexander Nevsky
description: In the 13th century, Prince Alexander Nevsky rallies the people of Russia to repel an invading force of Teutonic Knights.

title: The Baker's Wife
description: When a baker's wife runs off with a handsome shepherd, the baker refuses to bake bread until she returns, prompting the villagers to organize a search.

title: Olympia Part One: Festival of the Nations
description: A groundbreaking, though controversial, documentary covering the 1936 Berlin Olympics, known for its innovative camera techniques.

title: Kentucky
description: Two lovers from feuding families in Kentucky bond over their shared love of horse racing.

title: The Amazing Dr. Clitterhouse
description: A doctor attempts to understand the criminal mind by leading a gang of jewel thieves himself.

title: Suez
description: A fictionalized account of the efforts of Ferdinand de Lesseps to build the Suez Canal, including a massive dust storm.

title: The Sisters
description: Three sisters from Montana travel to San Francisco in the early 20th century, where one marries a sports writer just before the 1906 earthquake.

title: Of Human Hearts
description: A young man rebels against his preacher father and leaves his family to become a doctor during the Civil War, neglecting his mother.

title: Merrily We Live
description: A dizzy society matron has a habit of hiring tramps as servants, but her latest hire, a novelist, falls for her daughter.

title: The Young in Heart
description: A family of con artists befriends a wealthy, lonely old woman, intending to steal her fortune, but her kindness begins to change them.

title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
description: A talented young girl is rejected at a radio audition, but her uncle and a radio exec secretly turn her into a singing sensation.

title: A Yank at Oxford
description: A cocky American athlete attends Oxford University, where he clashes with British traditions and students before earning their respect.

title: Sidewalks of London
description: A street performer (busker) takes a young pickpocket under his wing and helps her become a star, only for her to outgrow him.

title: Too Hot to Handle
description: Rival newsreel cameramen compete for stories and the affection of a female aviator while covering dangerous events in China and the Amazon.

title: Yellow Jack
description: A dramatization of Major Walter Reed's campaign to find the cure for yellow fever in Cuba at the turn of the 20th century.

title: Brother Rat
description: Cadets at the Virginia Military Institute struggle to balance strict military discipline with sports, romance, and secret marriages.

title: Bank Holiday
description: During a busy bank holiday weekend, various people head to the seaside, including a nurse grieving a patient and a family seeking relaxation.

title: A Slight Case of Murder
description: After Prohibition ends, a bootlegger tries to go legitimate, but finds four dead bodies in the guest room of his country house.
